artist: Nakai Chikuzan; Kan Chazan; Tachihara Kyōsho; Shinozaki Shōchiku; Kikuchi Gozan; Yanagawa Seigan; Maki Ryōko; Kameda Ryōrai; Yamanaka Shinten'ō; Tanomura Chokunyū; Taigadō Teiryo
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
life_date: Nakai Chikuzan, Japanese, 1730–1804; Kan Chazan, Japanese, 1748–1827; Tachihara Kyōsho, Japanese, 1785–1840; Shinozaki Shōchiku, Japanese, 1781–1851; Kikuchi Gozan, Japanese, 1769–1849; Yanagawa Seigan, Japanese, 1789–1858; Maki Ryōko, Japanese, 1777–1843; Kameda Ryōrai, Japanese, 1778–1853; Yamanaka Shinten'ō, Japanese, 1822–1885; Tanomura Chokunyū, Japanese, 1814–1907; Taigadō Teiryo, Japanese, 1840–1910
signed: signatures throughout; handwritten title ULQ on cover
title: Album
